Class: MinHeap

util/minheap. MinHeap

new MinHeap()

Implementation of a min heap.

See digitaltsunami.net

Modified to expect only to contain objects that expose a 'score' value for comparison.

Methods

clear() → {Object}

Removes everything in the heap
Returns:
This heap
Type
Object

pop() → {Object}

Pop the minimum valued item off of the heap. The heap is then updated to float the next smallest item to the top of the heap.
Returns:
the minimum scored object contained within the heap.
Type
Object

pop() → {Object}

Returns the minimum value contained within the heap. This will not remove the value from the heap.
Returns:
the minimum scored object contained within the heap.
Type
Object

push(item)

Place an item in the heap.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
item Object An item that exposes a 'score' property

size() → {Number}

Return the current number of elements within the heap.
Returns:
size of the heap.
Type
Number
